title: Case 1
description: Circulars of the Petrograd Jewish Committee to the victims of the war, correspondence of the Shuya branch on assistance to the Jewish population with food and clothing, 1914-1916, 73 sheets.

title: Case 2
description: Minutes of meetings of the regional credit commission, 04.1916-05.1916, 19 sheets.

title: Case 3
description: Report on the activities of the Moscow Jewish Society for Aid to War Victims for August 1914 - April 1916, 08.1914-08.1916, 71 sheets.

title: Case 4
description: Report of the authorized Moscow Jewish Society on the activities of the Shui Jewish Circle; correspondence of the Shui commissioner about the plight of Jewish refugees, providing monetary assistance; lists of goods sent from the Jewish Public Committee in Kyiv, 1915-1920, 152 sheets.

title: Case 5
description: Reported estimates of income and expenses of the Pokrovsky and Bobrui committees, 12.1917-1920, 16 sheets.

title: Case 7
description: Correspondence with the Tula Jewish Commissariat for assistance to victims of war and the resettlement of refugees in the Tula province, providing them with material assistance, etc., 12.1915, 57 sheets.
